name: dynamic-remotes-node-typescript
description: Dynamic Remotes on server side with Node Federation

scripts.host: cd host && webpack build --config webpack.config.js && node dist/main.js
scripts.host:ts: cd host && webpack build --config webpack.config.typescript.js && node dist/main.js
scripts.start: concurrently 'pnpm run remote' 'sleep 5 && pnpm run host'
scripts.start:ts: concurrently 'pnpm run remote:ts' 'sleep 5 && pnpm run host:ts'
